item.title: Use github repo as helm chart repository
item.description: Goal Save the helm charts on github mainly for the RPI Kubernetes cluster Figure out a way to access them Build the chart and upload it to the helm repo For that purpose I used by kubeplay repo where I had helm charts and container ready git clone -b arm32v7 git@github.com:jbrette/kubeplay.git cd kubeplay/ helm package charts/kubeplay-arm32v7/ --app-version 0.1.0 --destination ./helmrepo/ cd helmrepo/ helm repo index . git add .
